channel.title: Baker Hughes Weekly Update on Concho Resources

item.title: Weekly Rigs
item.description: Weekly rig report sourced from Baker Hughes Map identifies week over week change in rig activity by county in New Mexico and Texas. The graph shows the top 10 counties by overall rig count beginning in 2016. Quote of the week It is hard to fail, but it is worse never to have tried to succeed. Theodore Roosevelt
